definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: "No, lady, "came the reply. "You stick it on the envelope ! "
sentences.chinese: “不，夫人，”郵務員回答說，“要貼在信封上。”

sentences.english: The envelope must be on a trail somewhere around Tillicum Village.
sentences.chinese: 信封一定就在提利坎姆村附近的一條小路上。

sentences.english: Please stick this stamp to the envelope before you mail the letter.
sentences.chinese: 在你寄出這封信之前，請把這張郵票貼在信封上。

sentences.english: Attach a stamp to the envelop and mail it.
sentences.chinese: 把郵票貼在信封上寄出去。

sentences.english: The server unwinds the envelope and executes the named methods with the passed arguments.
sentences.chinese: 服務器打開信封並使用傳入參數執行指定的方法。

sentences.english: The auction house estimates it to be worth as much as HK$60,000.
sentences.chinese: 蘇黎世亞洲預計這枚信封能拍出60，000港元。

sentences.english: If so, you must have put stamps on the letters before you sent them. So how did people receive letters before stamps were invented, and who came up with the idea of using stamps?
sentences.chinese: 如果寄過，那你一定在寄信之前在信封上貼上了郵票。

sentences.english: It has a dark gray envelope icon.
Tearing git open, she found four Paris phone numbers.
sentences.chinese: 打開信封后，她發現了四個巴黎市內的電話號碼。
我用了一個郵資已付的信封。

sentences.english: It said "From the star keeper to The Gospel Church".
sentences.chinese: 信封上寫着“發自星星燈守護人，寫給福音教堂。”

sentences.english: You may need to make an envelope to fit this oversized holiday card..
sentences.chinese: 也許你需要做個信封來放這張超大尺寸的節日賀卡。

sentences.english: In Tokyo, it's an envelope with $850,000 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 我字面翻譯是在東京，一個信封現金85萬美元。

sentences.english: She took a thick envelope out of her pocket. Handed it to Dale.
sentences.chinese: 她從口袋裏拿出一個厚厚的信封，遞給戴爾。

sentences.english: I enclose a stamped addressed envelope for your reply.
sentences.chinese: 貼有郵票並寫好地址的回郵信封。

sentences.english: You could also extract the envelope and body before processing.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以在處理前提取信封和主體。

definition: inside front cover (sometimes refers to both inside front and inside back covers)
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
